tool_description: Creates comprehensive air quality reports with charts, summaries, and recommendations for specified time periods.

report_type.description: Type of report: daily_summary, weekly_trend, monthly_analysis, custom

start_date.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: Report end date in ISO 8601 format

include_charts.description: Whether to include data visualization charts

error_messages: Invalid report type: Use daily_summary, weekly_trend, monthly_analysis, or custom.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Date range too large: Maximum report period is 1 year.
Empty metrics list: At least one metric must be specified.
Invalid format: Use summary, detailed, or executive.
usage: Specify report_type, start_date, end_date, and metrics_included. Optionally configure include_charts, include_recommendations, and format for customized output.

executive_summary.description: High-level summary of air quality findings

key_findings.description: List of important insights from the analysis
